This month has been by far the hardest thing I've had to go thru in my ENTIRE life.. All the people I have ever lost have gone in a matter of two years...

The hardest By far has been Carlos's death. There is this huge emptiness not only in my heart but in my life.. I don't think there is one thing I do that doesn't remind me of him. It's already been one month (well his one month is tomarrow), and to tell you the truth I don't know how I've gotten thru this.. other than the fact I have awesome supportive friends that are here for me 110%... There will never be a guy like Carlos or even one that can fill his position..He will forever be the LOVE OF MY LIFE...just like little Brandon always says... "just because he is gone doesn't mean that he isn't still with you".. that is very true....but on the other hand Carlos wouldn't want me to sit here and Cry about it, and wait all of my life to find someone again. He would tell me to be happy and live it up.. I know in my heart I will move on when the time is right, but I will never fully be over him... and I shouldn't be expected too... if I love him as much as I say I do than of course I will never be over him, but I will have to find someone who can show me just as much Love and compassion as he has. It would be our two-month anniversary tomarrow..and I can just tell.. I'm not going to be a happy camper... I've been pretty good with holding in my emotions unless I'm around Leann, and we both just say "fuck it" and let everything out.. we both sit and just think about how fucked up both of our lives are.. and then we sit there and laugh about how this shit just all needs to stop ... I mean seriously... WHAT MORE COULD POSSIBLY HAPPEN?!?... I know that God has his plans or whatever.. but me and Leann figure that we are both at about negative fifteen right now, so things could only move up from here...
I think God does thigs to prove points or to make us stronger..who knows why he does the things he does.. but I know that ever since Carlos passed, I pray everynight... I've turned to him.. I've put my life in his hands, and it is his to make of it what he wants... God doesn't do things to put us thru pain.. he does things for a reason, and behind everything he does there is a purpose for it ... just knowing that helps me to get thru each day...
